entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as a person who is offering to help Harry. He is described as making an Unbreakable Oath or Vow.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one being offered help by Snape and he confirms that Snape made an Unbreakable Oath or Vow to protect him.

entities.name: malfoy's mother
entities.description: Malfoy's mother is mentioned as someone who asked Snape to protect Harry. She is not explicitly named but referred to by her relation to Malfoy.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is standing with Harry at the kitchen sink and is reacting to Snape's offer of help.

entities.name: fred and george
entities.description: Fred and George are mentioned as people who tried to get Ron to make an Unbreakable Vow when he was five years old.

relationships.description: Snape is offering to help Harry, as mentioned in the conversation between Harry and Ron.
Malfoy's mother asked Snape to protect Harry, which led Snape to make an Unbreakable Oath or Vow.
Fred and George tried to get Ron to make an Unbreakable Vow when he was five years old.
